DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test effect modify carbohydrate diet versus portion control diet overweight obese men woman body weight .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Test Effects Low-Carbohydrate Diet Body Weight
DOC.criteria: Men woman 18 65 year age . Waist circumference measurement Visit 1 ( week 1 ) ³ 87 cm female ³ 90 cm male . Subject agree discontinue use supplement multivitamin ( except provide study period ) Visit 2 ( week 0 ) . Normally active judge good health basis medical history routine laboratory test . Subject must willing follow assign diet maintain usual physical activity level throughout trial . Subject understand procedure requirement study provide write informed consent authorization protect health information disclosure . Weight loss > 10 lb two month prior screen . Body mass index ( BMI ) > 37.0 kg/m2 . Current smoker ( cigarette use ) history smoke within 6 month prior screen . Postmenopausal woman current user hormone therapy discontinue hormone therapy within 2 month prior screen . History presence significant cardiac , renal , hepatic , pulmonary , biliary , endocrine disorder . Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ³ 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ³ 100 mm Hg two consecutive visit ) . History recurrent nephrolithiasis , acute episode nephrolithiasis within last year prior screen . History symptomatic cholelithiasis , unless subject undergone cholecystectomy . History gastrointestinal surgery weightreducing purpose . Active gastrointestinal disorder peptic ulcer disease malabsorption syndrome ( control lactose intolerance gastroesophageal reflux disease acceptable . ) Pancreatic disease : pancreatic enzyme deficiency , history pancreatitis . Fasting blood glucose ≥ 126 mg/dL visit 1 diagnose diabetes mellitus . Use weight loss medication , supplement , program , meal replacement product intend alter body weight within 4 week screen visit course study . Occasional use meal replacement bar shake snack acceptable . History presence cancer past 2 year , except successfully resect basal cell carcinoma skin . Psychiatric disorder require medication ( i.e. , selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ) could interfere subject 's compliance requirement protocol . History current presence diagnose eat disorder ( binge eating , bulimia , history anorexia ) . Use systemic corticosteroid , androgen , phenytoin . Use pseudoephedrine study period . Use lipidlowering drug supplement , unless dose stable prior enrollment ( 2 month prior drug , 2 week prior supplement ) . Use drug regulate hemostasis , stable dose aspirin . Use thyroid hormone , except stabledose replacement therapy ≥ 2 month prior enrollment . Abnormal laboratory test result clinical significance , include , limited total cholesterol > 300 mg/dL triglyceride > 400 mg/dL . Females pregnant , plan pregnant study period , lactate , woman childbearing potential use approved method contraception . A woman consider childbearing potential unless posthysterectomy , posttubal ligation , ³ 1 year postmenopausal . Recent history ( within past 12 month ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Alcohol abuse define > 14 drink per week ( 1 drink = 12 oz beer , 4 oz wine , 1 ½ oz distil spirit ) . Participation another clinical study within 30 day prior screen visit ( week 1 ) . Individual condition Investigator believe would interfere evaluation subject put subject undue risk .
